text: Maria Cristina Perez Naranjo (born April 11, 1965 in Málaga) is a wheelchair fencing athlete from Spain. She has a disability: she uses a wheelchair and is a Category A type fencer. She fenced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in Atlanta, Georgia. She finished third in the sword. == References == Category:Spanish fencers Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Malaga Category:Wheelchair fencers
title: María Cristina Perez Naranjo
